data.title: The Unlikely Lads
data.text:
Whatever happened to ? ...the unlikely lads

Unlikely Lads - Premier League

First team:

Louis Saha: (Paris, France 08.08.1978) see Premier League list.

Kenny Sansom: (Camberwell, 26.09.1958) QPR, Coventry City, Everton, Brentford, Watford, Croydon, Chertsey Town, media work.

Davide Santon: (Portomaggiore, Italy, 02.01.1991) see Premier League list.

Wes Saunders: (Sunderland, 23.02.1963) Bradford City (loan) Carlisle United, Dundee, Torquay United, Spennymoor United, Torquay United M, players agent, Jarrow Roofing AM.

Albert Scanlon: (Manchester, 10.10.1935) Lincoln City, Mansfield Town.

Jamie Scott: (Newcastle, 28.02.1960) Berwick Rangers, Ashington, Blyth Spartans.

Jimmy Scott: (Falkirk, Scotland, 21.08.1940) Crystal Palace, Publican, Aitkens Bar, Falkirk, now retired.

Kevin Scott: (Easington, 17.12.1966) see Premier League list.

Malcolm Scott: (South Shields, 08.05.1936) Darlington, York City.

Jimmy Scoular: (Livingston, Scotland 11.01.1925) Bradford Park Avenue, Cardiff City M, Newport County M, RIP 1998.

Scott Sellars: (Sheffield, 27.11.1965) see Premier League list.

Carl Serrant: (Bradford, 12.09.1975) see Premier League list.

Stan Seymour: (Kelloe, Durham 16.05.1893) RIP.

Len Shackleton: (Bradford, 03.05.1922) Sunderland, RIP.

Alan Shearer: (Gosforth, 13.08.1970) see Premier League list.

Kevin Sheedy: (21.10.1959, Builth Wells, Wales) Blackpool, Blackburn Rovers C, Tranmere Rovers AM, Hartlepool United AM, Everton AC.

Bobby Shinton: (West Bromwich, 06.01.1952) Millwall, Worcester City, Newmarket Town M, works at Aspinalls' Building Supplies, Willingham, Cambridge.

Alan Shoulder: (Bishop Auckland, 04.02.1953) Carlisle United, Hartlepool United, Ferryhill Ahletic, Blyth Spartans M, Crook Town M, Stanley United, Bishop Auckland M, Willington P/M, West Auckland M, Brandon United M.

Antoine Sibierski: (Lille, France, 05.08.1974) see Premier League list.

Joe Sibley: (Grays, 06.10.1919) Southend United, Folkestone Town, RIP 2008.

Danny Simpson: (Salford, 04.01.1987) CP (loan then permanent)

Neil Simpson: (Hackney, 15.11.1961) Motherwell, Cove Rangers, Elgin City commercial M, Aberdeen FITC Scheme C.

Ronnie Simpson: (Glasgow, 11.10.1930) Hibernian, Celtic, Hamilton Academical M, living in Edinburgh, Pools Panel member, RIP 2004.

Jackie Sinclair: (Culross, Scotland, 21.07.1943) Sheffield Wednesday, Chesterfield, Dunfermline, Stenhousemuir, golf club steward in Dunfermline.

Scott Sloan: (Wallsend, 14.12.1967) Falkirk, Cambridge United, Hartlepool United, Kalmar (Sweden), Whitley Bay, fireman on Tyneside, managing sandwich shop on Team Valley.

Andy Smailes: (Radcliffe, 21.05.1896) Blyth Spartans; NUFC (10/19); Sheffield Wednesday (10/22); Bristol City (10/23); Rotherham United (8/29), Rotherham T, Rotherham M, Scarborough M, RIP Shepton Mallet, 10.1978

Alan Smith: (Rothwell, 28.01.1980) see Premier League list.

Anthony Smith: (Sunderland, 20.02.1957) Peterborough United, Halifax Town, Hartlepool United, Newcastle Blue Star, working at Nissan.

David Smith: (South Shields, 12.10.1915) South Shields, Northampton Town, RIP 1998.

Jack Smith: (Batley, 17.02.1915) Manchester United, Blackburn Rovers, Port Vale, RIP 1975.

Jim Smith: (Glasgow, Scotland 20.01.1947) Whitley Bay, taxi driver.

Tot Smith: (Horden, 02.02.1923) Annfield Plain, Horden, RIP 1993.

Scott Snyder: Britannia Soccer, USA, MD.

Nolberto Solano: (Callao, Peru, 12.12.1974) see Premier League list.

Gary Speed: (Mancot, Wales, 08.09.1969) see Premier League list.

Pavel Srnicek: (Ostrava, Czech Republic, 10.03.1968) see Premier League list.

Ron Starling: (Pelaw, 11.01.1909) Sheffield Wednesday, Aston Villa, RIP 1991.

Paul Stephenson: (Wallsend, 02.01.1968) Millwall, Gillingham, Brentford, York City, Hartlepool United, Hartlepool United CM/YC, RC Norwich City, YC Huddersfield Town, unattached.

Ian Stewart: (Belfast, Northern Ireland, 10.09.1961). Portsmouth, Brentford (loan), Aldershot, Harrow Borough, UEFA C, Northern Ireland.

Mark Stimson: (Plaistow, 27.12.1967) Portsmouth, Barnet, Southend United, Leyton Orient, Canvey Island, Grays Athletic P/M, Stevenage Borough M, Gillingham M, Barnet M,

Kettering Town M, Thurrock M.

George Stobbart: (Wallsend, 13.07.1919) Luton, Millwall, Brentford, RIP.

Bob Stokoe: (Mickley, 21.09.1930) Bury, Bury M, Sunderland M, RIP 2004.

Albert Stubbins: (Wallsend, 13.07.1919) Liverpool, Ashington, journalist, New York Americans C (USA), RIP 2002.

Alan Suddick: (Chester-le-Street, 02.05.1944) Blackpool, Stoke City, Southport (loan), Bury, Barrow PM, Decorator in Blackpool, RIP March 2009.

Colin Suggett: (Washington, 30.12.1948) Ipswich Town S, Carlisle United S (now left)

Paul Sweeney: (Glasgow, Scotland, 10.01.1965) St.Johnstone, Gateshead, Hartlepool United, Durham City, Gateshead, Morpeth Town, South Shields.

Tommy Swinburne: (Houghton-le-Spring, 09.08.1915) Consett, Horden, RIP 1969.

Reserve/Junior:

Ronald Sales: (South Shields, 19.09.1920) Leyton Orient, Colchester United, Hartlepool United, RIP 1995.

Joseph Scott: (Fatfield 09.01.1930) Spennymoor United, Luton Town, Middlesbrough, Hartlepool, York City, Ashington.

Ryan Scott: tbc

Chris Shanks: (Ashington, 16.10.1986) St.Mirren (trial), Hamilton Academical (trial), Darlington (trial), Stockport County (trial), Blyth Spartans, Ashington.

Matthew Shutt: Barton FC, Black Sheep Hambleton Ales Combination (York) tbc.

Archie Simpson: (Dundee, Scotland, 08.06.1933) Barrow.

James Sloan: (Newcastle, 22.02.1924) Hartlepool United, RIP 1990.

Ben Smith: (Newcastle, 05.09.1986) Stockport County, Doncaster Rovers, Lincoln City (loan), Morecambe (loan), Doncaster Rovers, Shrewsbury Town (trial then permanent)

Dean Smith: tbc

George Smith: (Newcastle, 07.10.45) Barrow, Portsmouth, Middlesbrough, Birmingham City, Cardiff City, Swansea City, Hartlepool United (P then C), Stoke City S.

Jamie Smith: (Whiston, 21.01.1994) CP

Liam Smith: CP

Simon Smith: Whitley Bay, Gateshead, Canada national side GC, own goalkeeping consultancy, England U19 GC.

Daryl Smylie: (Portadown, Northern Ireland, 10.09.85) Stockport County (loan), Livingston, Östersunds FK (Sweden).

Ole Soderberg (Norkopping, Sweden 20.07.1990) see Premier League list.

Aaron Spear: (Plymouth, 29.04.1993) IBV (Iceland)

Alan Spears: (Amble, 27.12.1938) Millwall, Lincoln City.

Dan Staples: (Newcastle, 12.11.1990) Sunderland, Wrexham, in prison (convicted on charges of blackmail, planting an imitation explosive and robbery).

Eric Steele: (Newcastle, 14.05.1954) GK C, Aston Villa C, Manchester City, Blackburn Rovers, Manchester United. (as a player: Wallsend Boys Club, NUFC, Peterborough, Brighton, Watford, Aston Villa, Derby County, Mansfield, Southend).

Neil Stephenson: tbc

Terry Stoddart: (Newcastle, 28.11.1931) Darlington, York City. Gavin Stoker: (Sunderland, dob tbc) Chester-le-Street, Dunston Fed, Gateshead College, Chester-le-Street.

Graham Stokoe: (Newcastle under Lyme 17.12.1975) Stoke City, Hartlepool United.

Albert Storey: (Newcastle, 10.04.1949) NUFC, Blyth Spartans, NUFC, South Shields, North Shields, Wallsend, NEI Parsons, Percy Main, Walker (veterans).

James Storey: (Rowlands Gill, 30.12.1929) Exeter City, Bournemouth, Rochdale, Darlington.

Jimmy Sutton: (Glasgow, 06.09.1949) Mansfield Town, Morecambe, working for the Inland Revenue, Wren Rovers, Lytham.

Alan Sword: (Newcastle, 05.07.1934) Exeter City.

Coaching/Management:

Adam Sadler: (North Shields, 09.01.1980) Norwich C, Blyth Spartans C, Team Northumbria C, Gateshead C, Plymouth Argyle C, Manchester City AC.

Dean Saunders: (Swansea, 21.06.64) Wales AM, Wrexham M, Doncaster Rovers M.

Bobby Saxton: (Doncaster, 06.09.43) mackems C, NUFC S, retired.

Maurice Setters: (Honiton, 16.12.36): Ireland AM.

Dave Smith: Mansfield Town M, Southend United M, Dundee M, Devon YC.

Jim Smith: smoggies C, Portsmouth M, Derby M, Coventry City AM, Portsmouth AM, Southampton A,, Oxford United M, Oxford United D, Oxford United CM, retired.

Graeme Souness: (Edinburgh, Scotland, 06.05.53) media work.

Frank Spraggon: (Whickham, 27.10.45) tbc

Steve Stone: (Gateshead, 20.08.1971) Reserve C, Interim AM.

Trialist:

Bachirou Salou: (Lome, Togo, 15.09.70) NUFC (trial), Borussia Mönchengladbach (Germany), MSV Duisburg (Germany), Borussia Dortmund (Germany), Eintracht Frankfurt (Germany), Hansa Rostock (Germany), SC Kapellen-Erft (Germany), Alemannia Aachen (Germany), AS Eupen (Belgium), SC Kapellen-Erft (Germany), Togo AM.

Richard Scanlan: (may be Scanlon) Liverpool.

Darius Stanczak: Mariehem FF (Sweden)

Key:

If no letter, then player or:

C=Coach, M=Manager, AC= Assistant Coach AM = Assistant Manager, D=Director, JM=Joint Manager MD=Managing Director, RC= Reserve Coach, AD = Academy Director, AAD = Academy Asst. Director S=Scout
